verbose_text: Deubiquitinating protease A20 inhibits TLR4 mediated NF-kappaB activation, directly removing K63 linked polyubiquitin chains of TRAF6 while reducing production of antiviral and proinflammatory cytokines by inactivation of RIG-I dependent antiviral signaling 19.
evidence: Deubiquitinating protease A20 inhibits TLR4-mediated NF-kappaB activation, directly removing K63
